name: Calamity VR Demo
description:
Calamity VR Demo is a tech demonstration I created over the period of 2 months.
I wanted to create a VR game/experience to prove to myself I could actually develop in VR as it originally seemed very daunting.

Story:
You are a detective, you receive a letter from the towns people of Calamity, strange things are occurring and they have requested your expertise to help them.
Collect the evidence and reach the final reveal.

Game Mechanics:
The intro level should explain everything you need to know, anything else is more up to your imagination and what you think you could interact with.
Options menu is inbuilt to the Mobile Phone Object along with a Camera function.
Photos can be viewed in game in the Files option on the Phone and can also be found in the game files saved as PNG which should be located in "CalamityBuild\Binaries\Win64\Saved\Photos\"

Known bugs:
-Some physics issues that can throw the player about, nothing that breaks the game.
-Picking up papers with left hand has undesirable effects (using right hand fixes it).
-key rings will flip oddly when releasing from left hand (will right self when picked up again)
